game.name: Princess Fairytale Pony Grooming
game.description:
Your favorite Disney princess Elsa loves to enjoy time with a cute pony in the fairytale world. When they both are playing outside, her pony has come close to the dirt. So, needs an instant makeover. Would you help to groom her pony? Join Princess Fairytale Pony Grooming game and be prepared to give it a needful bath and help it to pick up the shining accessories! You have the skills to make it look as beautiful as your princess is. 

It will be a great fun to provide it with real makeover in this one of the best animals games for kids. Follow the instructions to clean it up and do not forget to dress it up with the lovely outfits available in the store! Start the process of grooming with the help of tools like a comb, hair dryer, soap and shampoo! The cute princess will surely be highly thankful to you if the final result will meet her expectations. 

Interact with the objects with the help of the mouse in this cool html5 girls game! Use the soap along with the water shower to wash the pony and then dry it up using a towel! Your fabulous efforts will be enough to amaze you and the princess in the end. Good luck to clean and dress it up to have fun to the fullest! Check out more amazing girls dressing games on atmegame.com and beat your boredom without download!
